pinnedAnnouncements.title: Q1 2025 Partner Incentive Program
pinnedAnnouncements.summary: Double accelerators on AI add-on deals through March 31, 2025
pinnedAnnouncements.content: We're excited to announce our Q1 2025 Partner Incentive Program! For all deals closed between January 1 - March 31, 2025, you'll earn 2x accelerators on any deal that includes the AI add-on package. This is a great opportunity to boost your commissions while helping customers unlock the full power of MELP's AI capabilities.
pinnedAnnouncements.actionText: Review incentive details in your Revenue dashboard
pinnedAnnouncements.author: Partner Program Team

pinnedAnnouncements.title: Enterprise Tier Pricing Update - Effective Feb 1
pinnedAnnouncements.summary: Important pricing changes for Enterprise tier deals
pinnedAnnouncements.content: Starting February 1, 2025, Enterprise tier pricing will be adjusted to reflect expanded features. Existing quotes remain valid until their expiry date. New quotes generated after Feb 1 will reflect updated pricing. Contact your Partner Manager if you have pending Enterprise deals that need expedited processing.
pinnedAnnouncements.actionText: Review updated pricing in Quotes & Pricing
pinnedAnnouncements.author: Partner Program Team

announcements.title: AI Meeting Summaries Now Support 12 Languages
announcements.summary: Multilingual AI summaries are now available for global teams
announcements.content: AI Meeting Summaries now support 12 languages including Spanish, French, German, Japanese, and Mandarin. This is a significant upsell opportunity for customers with international teams.
announcements.whatChanged: AI summaries can now be generated in the participant's preferred language automatically
announcements.whyItMatters: Global teams can now receive meeting summaries in their native language, improving adoption and productivity
announcements.whatToSay: Highlight this feature for any prospect with multi-regional teams. It's a strong differentiator against competitors.
announcements.author: Product Team

announcements.title: New Healthcare Industry Pitch Deck Available
announcements.summary: HIPAA-focused sales materials now in Resources
announcements.content: We've added a comprehensive Healthcare industry pitch deck to the Resources page. It includes HIPAA compliance positioning, healthcare-specific use cases, and customer testimonials from healthcare organizations.
announcements.whatToSay: Use this deck for any healthcare prospect. It addresses their top concerns around compliance and patient data protection.
announcements.author: Sales Enablement

announcements.title: Partner Certification Expiry Reminder
announcements.content: Partner certifications are valid for 12 months from completion. If your certifications are expiring soon, please complete the renewal modules to maintain your tier status. Expired certifications may affect your partner tier and discount levels.
announcements.actionText: Check your Training page for expiry dates
announcements.author: Partner Success Team

announcements.title: January Product Webinar: Advanced AI Features
announcements.summary: Deep dive into AI capabilities - January 18, 2025
announcements.content: Join us for an exclusive partner webinar covering advanced AI features including custom summary templates, action item extraction, and integration with workflow tools. This is perfect preparation for selling to enterprise customers.
announcements.author: Partner Enablement

announcements.title: Mobile App 2.0 Released
announcements.summary: Completely redesigned mobile experience now available
announcements.content: MELP Mobile App 2.0 is now available on iOS and Android. The new version features a completely redesigned interface, offline message access, and improved video call quality on mobile networks.
announcements.whatChanged: New mobile app with redesigned UI, offline support, and better video performance
announcements.whyItMatters: Mobile workers can now stay connected even with poor connectivity. Great for field teams and remote workers.
announcements.whatToSay: If prospects mention mobile workforce or remote teams, highlight the new mobile app capabilities.
announcements.author: Product Team

announcements.title: Deal Registration Protection Extended to 120 Days
announcements.summary: More time to close your registered deals
announcements.content: Effective January 1, 2025, deal registration protection has been extended from 90 days to 120 days. This gives you more time to work complex enterprise deals without worrying about protection expiry.
announcements.author: Partner Program Team

announcements.title: Case Study: GlobalTech Saves 40% on Meeting Time
announcements.content: A new case study featuring GlobalTech (5,000+ employees) is now available. They achieved a 40% reduction in meeting time using AI summaries and async video messaging. Great proof point for enterprise prospects.
announcements.author: Marketing Team

announcements.title: Year-End Commission Statements Available
announcements.content: Your 2024 year-end commission statements are now available in the Revenue section. You can download detailed transaction reports for your records. 1099 forms will be available by January 31, 2025.
announcements.author: Finance Team

announcements.title: SOC 2 Type II Certification Renewed
announcements.content: MELP has successfully renewed our SOC 2 Type II certification. Updated compliance documentation and audit reports are available in the Resources section for sharing with security-conscious prospects.
announcements.whyItMatters: This is essential for enterprise and regulated industry prospects who require proof of security practices.
announcements.whatToSay: For any prospect asking about security audits, we have fresh SOC 2 Type II certification.
announcements.author: Security Team

announcements.title: Partner Summit 2025 - Save the Date
announcements.summary: Annual Partner Summit - March 15-17, 2025 in Austin, TX
announcements.content: Mark your calendars for Partner Summit 2025! Join us in Austin, TX for three days of training, networking, and exclusive product previews. Early bird registration opens January 15.
announcements.author: Partner Program Team
